p: For HPV genotyping, the Abbott Real Time HR-HPV test was used. Briefly, viral DNA was extracted and amplified using the Abbott real-time polymerase chain reaction assay, with simultaneous detection and genotyping of HPV 16, HPV 18, and a pooled detection of 12 other HR-HPV genotypes (HPV 31, HPV 33, HPV 35, HPV 39, HPV 45, HPV 51, HPV 52, HPV 56, HPV 58, HPV 59, HPV 66 and HPV 68).
